text: <@U081DF9F18D> curious to hear if you solved the issue, we have a similar need to be able to resubscribe contacts via API in cases where the contact had previously unsubbed for both email and SMS.

<@U06CXT3CC5U> nope, apparently this is only available depending on your tier. The only way to do it if you donâ€™t have the correct tier to use this feature, is for the user to actively do it themselves. Really weird behavior if you ask me, but there we are
